Author: mintfleur
Text: Thank you. :( I hope you’re are doing better. This disorder messes with the mind so badly. And you feel like you can’t talk to anyone. So I have to rant here.   My final nail in the coffin was last night was when he told me I was “hostile” to speak to. And that I need to take a break from dating. I’m so paranoid about dating it’s not even funny. My brain just tells me I’m not good enough so why bother.

Author: mtothebeth
Text: i feel you. i care about you. as someone who is also neglected, by parents, "friends", "family", i completely understand what you're feeling right now. you're not alone in this.
